mutants.code:
import math

def total_ways(N, K):
    MOD = 1000000008
    if N < K:
        return 0
    den = math.factorial(K - 1) * math.factorial(N - K)
    num = math.factorial(N - 1)
    ans = num // den
    return ans % MOD
